description: Try our easy to follow Melting Olaf Muesli Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Melting Olaf Muesli Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g no added sugar plain yoghurt

recipeInstructions.text: Divide muesli among 6 tumblers and top with berries. Fit a piping bag with a fluted nozzle and fill with yoghurt. Pipe yoghurt into tumblers, then arrange currants for eyes on top, with apricot noses and date arms to serve.

Divide muesli among 6 tumblers and top with berries. Fit a piping bag with a fluted nozzle and fill with yoghurt. Pipe yoghurt into tumblers, then arrange currants for eyes on top, with apricot noses and date arms to serve.
